short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight your commits on buildbot pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will inject itself into all build.chromium.org console pages. You specify your full committer email in the options page and then it will highlight all your commits as they're cycling on the waterfall.
